comment: This professor is extremely pretentious and acts like her students are beneath her at all times. For the most part, all you have to do is show up and your grade will be exceptional. You wont learn from Bobo the Clown so students beware
It's an easy class but she's a great teacher! I completely understood everything we did, the class was a little slow, but she was making sure everyone understood.

Honestly, math is crazy hard for me. She is amazing. She has super clear lectures, not a ton of homework, but enough that if you can do it, you will get an A on the tests. She is nice, and funny, and I truly think she is the best math teacher Ive ever had. She actually cares too. If you can, take her.

She's fantastic. I mean. it's statistics so it's either easy or hard. But she's great at giving you extra help and you can really relate to her since she's a grad student. Much less intimidating than an Prof. Weekly short quizzes to boost your grade and if you understand the study guide you'll be in great shape. Take her!
The class is basically plugging things into a calculator. She is nice and tries to make the class fun. She also lets you use formulas on test and quizzes.

She was an excellent teacher and had very clear instructions for how to do all the material covered in class. Explains everything in detail and still has time to let you out early everyday. Also provides student notes so you don't have to draw out graphs and write notes word for word. Let's you use a notecard on all assessments. Highly recommend.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Amazing lectures

comment: She is the best stat teacher at ksu! She will do everything she can to help you get an A! She gives us study guides and goes over them that exactly like the test. She lets you used an index card for every test and quiz and some quizzes are online. This was the easiest math I've ever taken. Highly recommend!!!!
